segments.text: How do you get paid ? If you don't mind my asking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not cash . But if our launch goes well , my stock options will pay off , big time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And in the meantime , how do you pay the rent ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't have to worry about rent . I live right here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right here . Me and my PC . Home sweet home .
segments.speaker: S2
